greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(0) = 0, a(3n) = 1 + 2*a(2n - 1), a(3n+1) = 1 + 2*a(2n), a(3n+2) = 2*a(n+1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..9842
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(A007051(n)) = 2^n for all n >= 0. [A property shared with A064216.]
program: print([a(n) for n in range(101)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jun 06 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 25 2015
